{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer AX6000 |revision=(US) v1.0 |series=AX6000 |asin=B07L56SN8M |price=350 |fcc_date=12/10/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7AX6000 |ic_id=8853A-AX6000 |pcb_id=2050503249 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1735, 4AT-15 Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81MA-25T |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYMA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 (Type A), USB 3.0 (Type C), |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1824 P21, 6TV-01 B2 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1824 P21, 6TV-01 B2 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54991E;BCM54991EB0KFSBG; |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG, TN1717 P21, 218-11 P3 W; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=2.5G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN HP FEM;Qorvo;QRR1;;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN HP FEM;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;85743, 66465, 1808 MX;4; ,,, Bluetooth 5.0 Chip;Cypress;CYW20704;20704UA2, KFFB1G, UN1646 P12, 639581 P3;1; |flags=Wi-Fi 6, 1024QAM, VHT160, MU-MIMO, IFTTT, Alexa, Bluetooth 5.0, LACP, Link Aggregation, Band Steering, DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |default_ssid=TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G |default_ip=http://tplinkwifi.net |oui=B0:BE:76 |oui_eth=B0:BE:76 }}
:• '''1148''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [[Wikipedia:IEEE_802.11ax|802.11ax]] (40MHz chan.) :• '''4804''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [[Wikipedia:IEEE_802.11ax|802.11ax]] (160MHz chan.) = '''''AX6000'' class'''
{{TagLine|AX6000 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/cat-9_Archer-AX6000_V1-preview.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-AX6000}} The 2.5Gbps WAN chip's ID is not legible in the FCC internal photos. :[[Broadcom]] BCM54991EB0 is just a guess ([https://file.hkepc.net/2019/01/source/23163235551096275390.jpg image]). ===News=== *[https://www.tp-link.com/ro/news-details-18054.html ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 and AX11000 Routers Series'' on '''TP-LINK'''] (RO) *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13697/tplink-announces-archer-ax6000-and-ax11000-wifi-6-80211ax-routers ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 and AX11000 Wi-Fi 6 Routers'' on '''AnandTech'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.hkepc.com/17630/%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4_Multi_Gigabit_%E9%80%A3%E6%8E%A5_TP-LINK_Archer_AX6000 ''TP-LINK Archer AX6000 Multi Gigabit Router'' on '''HKEPC'''] (CN) :OUI: B0:BE:76 ([https://file.hkepc.net/2019/01/source/1717184727880127350.jpg Label], [https://file.hkepc.net/2019/01/source/2316323454298622910.jpg PCB images]) ===See also=== * [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] * [[TP-LINK Archer AX11000]] __NOTOC__
